title: Cajun Justice S01E20E21
description:
Thu Aug 16, 2012	Bourgeouis' Last Stand, Pt. 1

Part 1 of 2. Deputies hunt copper thieves; shots are fired in the swamp in the middle of the night; a deputy investigates a strange theft case.

	

Thu Aug 16, 2012	Bourgeouis' Last Stand, Pt. 2

Conclusion. Deputies pursue suspects in a copper-theft case; a deputy's birthday dinner turns into a gator hunt; a man claims to have captured a fabled swamp creature.
